title: Authors and Citation
text: Kuethe S, Friess N (2024). rtabulator: R Bindings Tabulator JS. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rtabulator: R Bindings for Tabulator JS},   author = {Stefan Kuethe and Nico Friess},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
text: goal rtabulator make breeze creating beautiful reactive tables using Tabulator JS

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
text: can install development version rtabulator like :
code: remotes::install_github("eodaGmbH/rtabulator")

title: R Bindings for Tabulator JS
code: library(rtabulator)  tabulator(mtcars)

what: Add a row to the table — add_row
title: Add a row to the table — add_row
Add a row to the table — add_row
code: add_row(ctx, row = NULL)

title: Add a row to the table — add_row
text: ctx (tabulatorContext): tabulator context object row (list | NULL) row data NULL add empty row

what: Create columns definition from data — create_columns
title: Create columns definition from data — create_columns
Create columns definition from data — create_columns
code: create_columns(data, editor = FALSE, filter = FALSE)

title: Create columns definition from data — create_columns
text: data (data.frame) data editor (bool): Whether make columns editable. filter (bool): Whether add header filter columns.

what: Delete selected rows from the table — delete_selected_rows
title: Delete selected rows from the table — delete_selected_rows
Delete selected rows from the table — delete_selected_rows
code: delete_selected_rows(ctx)

title: Delete selected rows from the table — delete_selected_rows

what: Parse List to Data Frame — list_to_data_frame
title: Parse List to Data Frame — list_to_data_frame
Parse List to Data Frame — list_to_data_frame
code: list_to_data_frame(x)

title: Parse List to Data Frame — list_to_data_frame
Redo changes — redo
code: redo(ctx)

title: Shiny bindings for rtabulator — rtabulator-shiny
text: Output render functions using rtabulator within Shiny applications interactive Rmd documents.

title: Shiny bindings for rtabulator — rtabulator-shiny
code: tabulatorOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")  renderTabulator(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Shiny bindings for rtabulator — rtabulator-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates rtabulator env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.

title: Color Formatter — set_formatter_color
code: set_formatter_color(widget, column)

title: Color Formatter — set_formatter_color
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied .

title: Color Formatter — set_formatter_color
code: data <- data.frame(   Label = c("R", "G", "B"),   Color = c("red", "green", "blue") )  tabulator(data, width = 200) |>   set_formatter_color("Color")  {"x":{"data":{"Label":["R","G","B"],"Color":["red","green","blue"],"id":[1,2,3]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Label","field":"Label","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"Color","field":"Color","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"color"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Datetime formatter — set_formatter_datetime
code: set_formatter_datetime(   widget,   column,   input_format = "yyyy-MM-dd hh:ss:mm",   output_format = "yy/MM/dd",   invalid_placeholder = "(invalid datetime)",   timezone = NA )

title: Datetime formatter — set_formatter_datetime
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . input_format (character): datetime input format. output_format (character): datetime output format. invalid_placeholder (character): value displayed invalid datetime provided. timezone (character): timezone datetime.

title: Datetime formatter — set_formatter_datetime
code: data <- data.frame(   Person = c("Franz", "Ferdinand"),   Birthday =c(     "2024-12-06 22:00:10",     "2023-06-07 14:12:45"   ) )  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_datetime("Birthday", output_format = "dd.MM.yyyy")  {"x":{"data":{"Person":["Franz","Ferdinand"],"Birthday":["2024-12-06 22:00:10","2023-06-07 14:12:45"],"id":[1,2]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Person","field":"Person","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"Birthday","field":"Birthday","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"datetime","formatterParams":{"inputFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd hh:ss:mm","outputFormat":"dd.MM.yyyy","invalidPlaceholder":"(invalid datetime)","timezone":null}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: HTML Formatter — set_formatter_html
code: set_formatter_html(widget, column, hoz_align = c("left", "center", "right"))

title: HTML Formatter — set_formatter_html
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: HTML Formatter — set_formatter_html
code: data <- data.frame( id = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7), text_style = c( "Italic", "Bold", "Green", "Deleted", "Small", "H2O", "x2" ) ) tabulator(data, width=200) |> set_formatter_html("text_style") {"x":{"data":{"id":[1,2,3,4,5,6,7],"text_style":["Italic<\/i>","Bold<\/b>","Green<\/span>","Deleted<\/del>","Small<\/small>","H2<\/sub>O","x2<\/sup>"]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"id","field":"id","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"text_style","field":"text_style","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"html"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Image Formatter — set_formatter_image
code: set_formatter_image(   widget,   column,   height = "50px",   width = "50px",   url_prefix = NULL,   url_suffix = NULL,   hoz_align = "center" )

title: Image Formatter — set_formatter_image
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . height (character): CSS value height image. width (character): CSS value width image. url_prefix (character): String add start cell value generating image src url. url_suffix (character): String add end cell value generating image src url. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Image Formatter — set_formatter_image
code: image_url <- "https://picsum.photos/id/" image_size <- 100  image_data <- data.frame(   image = c(88, 98, 102, 201),   label = c("Pic No. 88", "Pic No. 98", "Pic No. 102", "Pic No 201") )  tabulator(image_data, tabulator_options(height = "400px")) |>   set_formatter_image(     "image",     height = image_size,     width = image_size,     url_prefix = image_url,     url_suffix = glue::glue("/{image_size}"),     hoz_align = "left"   )  {"x":{"data":{"image":[88,98,102,201],"label":["Pic No. 88","Pic No. 98","Pic No. 102","Pic No 201"],"id":[1,2,3,4]},"options":{"height":"400px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"image","field":"image","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"image","formatterParams":{"height":100,"width":100,"urlPrefix":"https://picsum.photos/id/","urlSuffix":"/100"}},{"title":"label","field":"label","hozAlign":"left"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Link Formatter — set_formatter_link
code: set_formatter_link(   widget,   column,   label_field = NULL,   url_prefix = NULL,   url = NULL,   target = "_blank",   hoz_align = "left" )

title: Link Formatter — set_formatter_link
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . label_field (character): Column used label link. url_prefix (character): Prefix add URL value. url (JS function): JS function return URL value. cell passed function first argument. Use JS pass JS code. target (character): Target attribute anchor tag. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Link Formatter — set_formatter_link
code: data <- data.frame(   label = c("This is a link", "This is another link"),   link = c("https://eoda.de", "https://eoda.de/data-science"),   link2 = c("eoda.de", "github.com"),   link3 = c("guinan", "data-science") )  js_func <- "(cell) => `https://eoda.de/${cell.getValue()}`"  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_link("link", label_field = "label") |>   set_formatter_link("link2", url_prefix = "https://") |>   set_formatter_link("link3", url = htmlwidgets::JS(js_func), label_field = "label")  {"x":{"data":{"label":["This is a link","This is another link"],"link":["https://eoda.de","https://eoda.de/data-science"],"link2":["eoda.de","github.com"],"link3":["guinan","data-science"],"id":[1,2]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"label","field":"label","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"link","field":"link","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"labelField":"label","target":"_blank"}},{"title":"link2","field":"link2","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"urlPrefix":"https://","target":"_blank"}},{"title":"link3","field":"link3","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"link","formatterParams":{"labelField":"label","url":"(cell) => `https://eoda.de/${cell.getValue()}`","target":"_blank"}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":["options.columns.3.formatterParams.url"],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
code: set_formatter_money(   widget,   column,   decimal = c(",", "."),   thousand = c(".", ","),   symbol = "EUR",   symbol_after = "p",   negative_sign = "-",   precision = FALSE,   hoz_align = "left" )

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . decimal (character): Symbol represent decimal point. thousand (character, bool): Symbol represent thousands separator. Set FALSE disable separator. symbol (character): currency symbol. symbol_after (bool): Whether put symbol number. negative_sign (character, bool): sign show front number. Set TRUE causes negative numbers enclosed brackets (123.45), standard style negative numbers accounting. precision (integer, bool): number decimals display. Set FALSE display decimals provided. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Money Formatter — set_formatter_money
code: data <- data.frame(    Account_Number= c(       123456,       345667,       234567,       234566      ),   Account_Balance = c(100, -50, 200.30, -21.5) )  tabulator(data, width = 300) |>   set_formatter_money("Account_Balance", symbol_after = FALSE)  {"x":{"data":{"Account_Number":[123456,345667,234567,234566],"Account_Balance":[100,-50,200.3,-21.5],"id":[1,2,3,4]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Account_Number","field":"Account_Number","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"Account_Balance","field":"Account_Balance","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"money","formatterParams":{"decimal":",","thousand":".","symbol":"EUR","symbolAfter":false,"negativeSign":"-","precision":false}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Plain Text Formatter — set_formatter_plaintext
code: set_formatter_plaintext(widget, column, hoz_align = "left")

title: Plain Text Formatter — set_formatter_plaintext
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Progress Formatter — set_formatter_progress
code: set_formatter_progress(   widget,   column,   min = NA,   max = NA,   color = c("yellow", "orange", "red"),   legend = NA,   legend_color = "#000000",   legend_align = c("center", "left", "right", "justify"),   hoz_align = "left" )

title: Progress Formatter — set_formatter_progress
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . min (numeric): minimum value progress bar. set NA minimum value column used. max description color (character): Either single color vector colors legend (character, TRUE, JavaScript function): set TRUE value cell displayed. Set NA display value . Use JS pass JS function legend. cell value passed function first argument. legend_color (character): text color legend. legend_align (character): text alignment legend. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Progress Formatter — set_formatter_progress
code: data <- data.frame(   id = 1:6,   value = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60),   value2 = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60),   value3 = c(10, 0, 100, 20, 40, 60) )  js_func <- htmlwidgets::JS("(cellValue) => `${cellValue}%`")  tabulator(data, width = 300) |>   set_formatter_progress("value") |>   set_formatter_progress("value2", legend = TRUE, legend_align = "left") |>   set_formatter_progress("value3", legend = js_func, legend_align = "right")  {"x":{"data":{"id":[1,2,3,4,5,6],"value":[10,0,100,20,40,60],"value2":[10,0,100,20,40,60],"value3":[10,0,100,20,40,60]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"id","field":"id","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"value","field":"value","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":null,"legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"center"}},{"title":"value2","field":"value2","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":true,"legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"left"}},{"title":"value3","field":"value3","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"progress","formatterParams":{"min":0,"max":100,"color":["yellow","orange","red"],"legend":"(cellValue) => `${cellValue}%`","legendColor":"#000000","legendAlign":"right"}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":["options.columns.3.formatterParams.legend"],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Star Rating Formatter — set_formatter_star
code: set_formatter_star(widget, column, number_of_stars, hoz_align = "center")

title: Star Rating Formatter — set_formatter_star
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . number_of_stars maximum number stars displayed. hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Star Rating Formatter — set_formatter_star
code: data <- data.frame(   Passengers = c("Hans", "Franz", "Ferdinand", "Julia"),   PassengerClass = c(1, 2, 1, 3) )  tabulator(data, width = 200) |>   set_formatter_star("PassengerClass", number_of_stars = max(data$PassengerClass))  {"x":{"data":{"Passengers":["Hans","Franz","Ferdinand","Julia"],"PassengerClass":[1,2,1,3],"id":[1,2,3,4]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Passengers","field":"Passengers","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"PassengerClass","field":"PassengerClass","hozAlign":"center","formatter":"star","formatterParams":{"stars":3}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Text Area Formatter — set_formatter_textarea
code: set_formatter_textarea(widget, column, hoz_align = "left")

title: Text Area Formatter — set_formatter_textarea
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Text Area Formatter — set_formatter_textarea
code:
data <- data.frame(   id = c(1, 2),   txt = c(     "This
is
some
text
with
multiple
line
breaks",     "- R
- Python
- Julia"     ) )  tabulator(data, width = 200) |>   set_formatter_textarea("txt")  {"x":{"data":{"id":[1,2],"txt":["This
is
some
text
with
multiple
line
breaks","- R
- Python
- Julia"]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"id","field":"id","hozAlign":"right"},{"title":"txt","field":"txt","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"textarea"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Tick Cross Formatter — set_formatter_tick_cross
code: set_formatter_tick_cross(widget, column)

title: Tick Cross Formatter — set_formatter_tick_cross
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied .

title: Tick Cross Formatter — set_formatter_tick_cross
code: data <- data.frame(   Artist = c("Art Blackey", "Nirvana", "Bob Marley"),   Grunge = c(0, 1, 0),   Jazz = c(1, 0, 0),   Reggae = c(0,0,1) )  tabulator(data, width = 400) |>   set_formatter_tick_cross("Grunge") |>   set_formatter_tick_cross("Jazz") |>   set_formatter_tick_cross("Reggae")  {"x":{"data":{"Artist":["Art Blackey","Nirvana","Bob Marley"],"Grunge":[0,1,0],"Jazz":[1,0,0],"Reggae":[0,0,1],"id":[1,2,3]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Artist","field":"Artist","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"Grunge","field":"Grunge","hozAlign":"right","formatter":"tickCross"},{"title":"Jazz","field":"Jazz","hozAlign":"right","formatter":"tickCross"},{"title":"Reggae","field":"Reggae","hozAlign":"right","formatter":"tickCross"}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Toggle Switch Formatter — set_formatter_toggle_switch
code: set_formatter_toggle_switch(   widget,   column,   size = 20,   on_value = "on",   off_value = "off",   on_truthy = FALSE,   on_color = "green",   off_color = "red",   clickable = TRUE )

title: Toggle Switch Formatter — set_formatter_toggle_switch
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . size (numeric): size switch pixels. on_value (character): value cell switch . off_value (character) value cell switch . on_truthy (bool): TODO: ??? on_color (character): color switch . off_color (character): color switch . clickable (bool): Enable switch functionality toggle cell value click.

title: Toggle Switch Formatter — set_formatter_toggle_switch
code: data <- data.frame(   Language = c("R", "Python", "Julia"),   Available = c("yes", "yes", "no") )  tabulator(data) |>   set_formatter_toggle_switch("Available", on_value = "yes", off_value = "no")  {"x":{"data":{"Language":["R","Python","Julia"],"Available":["yes","yes","no"],"id":[1,2,3]},"options":{"height":"311px","history":false,"layout":"fitColumns","responsiveLayout":false,"movableColumns":false,"headerVisible":true,"addRowPos":"bottom","movableRows":false,"resizableRows":false,"index":"id","editTriggerEvent":"dblclick","selectableRows":"highlight","pagination":false,"paginationSize":10,"paginationAddRow":"page","spreadsheet":false,"columns":[{"title":"Language","field":"Language","hozAlign":"left"},{"title":"Available","field":"Available","hozAlign":"left","formatter":"toggle","formatterParams":{"size":20,"onValue":"yes","offValue":"no","onTruthy":false,"onColor":"green","offColor":"red","clickable":true}}]},"stylesheetText":null},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

title: Traffic Light Formatter — set_formatter_traffic_light
code: set_formatter_traffic_light(   widget,   column,   min = NA,   max = NA,   color = c("green", "orange", "red"),   hoz_align = "center" )

title: Traffic Light Formatter — set_formatter_traffic_light
text: widget (tabulator) tabulator widget. column (character): column formatter applied . min (numeric): minimum value progress bar. set NA minimum value column used. max description color (character): Either single color vector colors hoz_align (character): horizontal alignment column.

title: Create a Tabulator Widget — tabulator
code: tabulator(   data,   options = tabulator_options(),   editable = FALSE,   sheetjs = FALSE,   theme = c("default", "midnight", "modern", "simple", "site", "bootstrap3",     "bootstrap4", "bootstrap5", "bulma", "materialize", "semanticui"),   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   element_id = NULL,   ... )

title: Create a Tabulator Widget — tabulator
text: data (data.frame, character list): spreadsheet mode data needs list NULL empty spreadsheet. options (list): Setup options. See tabulator_options. editable (bool): Whether table editable. sheetjs (bool): Whether add sheetjs (https://sheetjs.com/) dependency, needed xlsx downloads. theme (character): Theme apply table. width Width widget. height Height widget. element_id description ... Named arguments appended options parameter.

title: Create a Tabulator Context — tabulatorContext
code: tabulatorContext(output_id, session = shiny::getDefaultReactiveDomain())

title: Create a Tabulator Context — tabulatorContext
text: output_id (character): tabulator output id. session shiny session object

title: Tabulator Setup Options — tabulator_options
code: tabulator_options(   height = "311px",   history = FALSE,   columns = NULL,   layout = c("fitColumns", "fitData", "fitDataFill", "fitDataStretch", "fitDataTable"),   responsive_layout = FALSE,   movable_columns = FALSE,   header_visible = TRUE,   row_height = NULL,   add_row_pos = c("bottom", "top"),   movable_rows = FALSE,   resizable_rows = FALSE,   frozen_rows = NULL,   index = "id",   group_by = NULL,   edit_trigger_event = "dblclick",   selectable_rows = "highlight",   pagination = FALSE,   pagination_size = 10,   pagination_add_row = "page",   spreadsheet = FALSE,   spreadsheet_rows = NULL,   spreadsheet_columns = NULL,   spreadsheet_column_definition = NULL,   spreadsheet_sheets = NULL,   spreadsheet_sheet_tabs = NULL,   ... )

title: Tabulator Setup Options — tabulator_options
text: height (character) height table px. history (bool): Enable user interaction history functionality. columns (list): Column definitions. set NULL definitions auto generated table data. layout (character): Layout mode table columns. responsive_layout (bool): Automatically hide show columns fit width Tabulator element. movable_columns (bool): Allow users move reorder rows. header_visible (bool): Whether header visible. row_height (numeric): fixed height rows. add_row_pos (character): table position new rows added. movable_rows (bool): Allow users move reorder rows. resizable_rows (bool): Allow user resize rows. frozen_rows (numeric): Number frozen rows. index (character): Field used unique index row. group_by (character): Field group rows . edit_trigger_event description selectable_rows description pagination (bool): description pagination_size (integer): description pagination_add_row (character): description spreadsheet (bool): description spreadsheet_rows (integer): description spreadsheet_columns (integer): description spreadsheet_column_definition description spreadsheet_sheets (list): description spreadsheet_sheet_tabs (bool): description ... options.

title: Download table data — trigger_download
code: trigger_download(ctx, type = c("csv", "json", "xlsx"), file_name)

title: Download table data — trigger_download
text: ctx (tabulatorContext): tabulator context object type (character): csv, json xlsx (needs sheetjs: tabulator(..., sheetjs = TRUE)) file_name (character): file name

title: Submit data to R — trigger_get_data
code: trigger_get_data(ctx)

title: Submit data to R — trigger_get_spreadsheet_data
code: trigger_get_spreadsheet_data(ctx)

title: Undo changes — undo
code: undo(ctx)
